LanguageData.Beer.label: beer
LanguageData.Beer.description: The first beverage besides water ever consumed by mankind. Beer can taste good, but its main effect is intoxication. Excessive consumption can lead to alcohol blackouts and, over time, addiction.
LanguageData.Beer.tools.bottle.label: bottle
LanguageData.Beer.tools.neck.label: neck
LanguageData.Wort.label: wort
LanguageData.Wort.description: Un-fermented beer. This substance needs to ferment in a fermenting barrel before it becomes drinkable beer.
